title: Stay in Historic Elegance on the Adriatic Coast Near Kotor Bay & Medieval Herceg Novi
description: Discover why Montenegro’s beautiful Kotor Bay is one of Europe’s hottest destinations - and be amongst the first to experience the beautiful Lazure Marina & Hotel, an 18th century harbourside building transformed into a luxury boutique getaway. Unwind in a palatial Suite and soak up views over the glistening waters of the Adriatic as you enjoy daily breakfast, a EUR50 dinner credit to be used at the hotel's restaurant, a EUR30 Spa credit for any treatment at the newly opened on-site spa and a bottle of wine.
offer_address: Braće Pedišića bb, Herceg Novi (Meljine) 85340, Montenegro

vendor_name: Azul Beach Resort Montenegro, by Karisma
title: Montenegro Beachfront Resort with Eight Glittering Pools
description: Strike the perfect balance between coastal relaxation and family fun at Azul Beach Resort Montenegro, stretched along the shores of the Adriatic. With an enviable location on one of Montenegro's most sought-after beaches, this escape has everything you’d expect of an award-winning retreat. Joyful and bountiful in every sense, the resort features eight glimmering pools, a heart-stopping high-ropes course, 12 unique restaurants and bars, sports courts, a kids' club and so much more.
